entries.arrived_at_loc: You have been assigned this location to cover the bombers retreat. Don't let anyone pass!
entries.attack_notify: Tactical Computer: < Incoming fighter vessels. Scans show weapons armed. >
entries.attack_stopped: Tactical Computer: < No more fighter vessels within sensor range. >
entries.first_attack: We see multiple bandits incoming towards you. Good luck pilot, we're counting on you.
entries.found_loc: Get over to this location quickly and cover our bombers retreat pilot!
entries.mission_complete: Worvog Arkon: < All the Rebel bombers have left the sector. You amaze me pilot, didn't think anyone could survive that assault. Head back to base. >
entries.outofrange: Worvog Arkon: < You are too far away from your assigned sector, the Imperial fighters will slip by you! >
entries.outofrange_failed: Worvog Arkon: < We're losing squads all over the place up there! Get out of there while you still can pilot! >
entries.quest_defendpoint_d: Stay close to these coordinated and don't let any hostile ships get past you. We will inform you when our bombers are safe. Good luck pilot!
entries.quest_location_d: We are aware that you are asked to do this in a very hostile sector of the Dathomir system but it is our hope that you will prevail.
entries.quest_reachpoint_d: Fly to this area immediately and cover the Alliance B-Wings retreat.
entries.title: Dathomir system: Cover the Rebel bombers retreat.
entries.title_d: After the failed attack on the space stations defenses, we need to retreat out of the area. The Empire is sending fighters to intercept our bombers and your orders are to cover their retreat.
entries.trans_update: Worvog Arkon: < %DI percent of the Rebel bombers have escaped the sector. Hang in there my friend, fight them off! >
entries.transmission_received: Worvog Arkon: < The last of the B-Wing squadrons are jumping to hyperspeed, we didn't suffer a single loss! >
entries.transmission_start: Worvog Arkon: < We're estimating that the Rebel B-Wings need about 8 minutes to hyperspace out safely. >
